pi.title: Full Stack Software Developer
pi.bio:
With a strong background in problem-solving and analytical thinking, Wilson has a proven track record of delivering high-quality work and exceeding expectations. He is proficient in various programming languages and is committed to continuous learning and professional development.

Wilson is a creative problem-solver with excellent communication and interpersonal skills, and is dedicated to delivering innovative solutions that meet the needs of clients or stakeholders. Overall, he is a dynamic and versatile professional who brings energy, enthusiasm, and expertise to every project or role in software engineering.

jam.title: FrontEnd Engineer
jam.description: Jam platform is a gaming website where players select and play games. See at [https://jam.gg/play](https://jam.gg/play "https://jam.gg/play")
achievements: Implement new React components and integrate them into pages on a full front-end refactoring process;

quable.title: Software Engineer Consultant
quable.description: As a consultant, I am on assignment at [Quable](https://quable.com/ "Quable"), working on the Quable's PIM as a FrontEnd developer
achievements: Search engine optimization, including the creation of custom sitemaps and restructuring page URLs using slugs, as well as the internationalization of URLs;
Fixed some bugs and worked on designing and developing the mobile version of the game rooms..

midjamo.title: Freelance Full Stack Developer

kathalog.title: Freelance Front-End Developer
kathalog.description: Kathalog is a restaurant search and discovery site. This platform reveals the geolocation, photos, addresses and menus of restaurants in Cameroon.
